name: The Legend of the Upriser - Gameplay Test
name_original: The Legend of the Upriser - Gameplay Test
description:
The Legend of the Upriser is a hand-drawn platformer boss rush. The combat takes a lot of inspiration from Hollow Knight.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: movement

'Z' : attack/select

'X':  dash

Special thanks:

To MixKit and ZapSplat for their excellent free SFX.

To VoidGaming1 from itch.io for providing the game's main theme " Chilling Monkey".

To Vivedo.net for proving Captian Kian's theme, "Ultimate Victory."

To Godot for their awesome engine.

To you for playing this game.
